file_content.text: Thank you again for the artifacts.
Your apprentice told me you wanted these artifacts.
What apprentice? Oh, you mean to say you saw Solrak. And he was alive.
Hmm. I didn't think he'd survive the Nightmare Lands for a moment, let alone persuade someone of your esteem to help him. Perhaps I misjudged the pathetic creature.
He was in bad shape when I saw him, but he was determined as ever to prove himself.
The wretch is probably dead by now. Forget him.
A weakling to the end. Just as I supposed.
We'll see if he manages to return from the Nightmare Lands.
